title: criptobliznec
author: criptobliznec
content: Greetings traders, investors in the cryptocurrency market.Today, almost all traders are looking for a suitable exchange delta.Where, how to start trading with DEX, CEX, with one click.The Kattana marketplace https://kattana.io/ can offer trading with cryptocurrencies for 40 or more DEX.Kattana works with two main algorithms: Overline and Stop limit.Place your orders, while paying for gas only after the limit order is executed.It is possible to use the Kattana Dapp app to trade with your smartphone, anywhere, any time of the year.Recently Kattana update has been released https://blog.kattana.io/kattanas-huge-update-is-here/Add the pairs you trade with to your whitelist.Use the global search or add an existing cryptocurrency.I think every trader will be able to find the trading strategy on Kattana that he aspires to.Cryptocurrency trading on the Kattana trading platform https://app.kattana.io/ is a simple, convenient way to get a profit.Kattana is a cross-chain trading terminal for DEX and CEX.Working with big data trading, Kattana gives users the ability to trade, in real time, on more than 40 DEXs across multiple networks, including Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, HECO, and Avalanche.
